	Create java application to solve a simple problem below. 
	Read the yaml files for input (Sample input given below). Look for the labels.part-of variable to decide the processing logic. 
	For "PartnerOnboarding", the output will be based64 of the cert and for "GenericOnboarding", the output will be output cert into single-line.

Expectation From source code:
- Application should be shipped, build as production code quality.
- Clean code style is expected.
- Open for future changes
- Include test case 
- Any frameworks or libraries are allowed.
- include README to show to run the application
